import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import { Button, Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Link from 'react-router-dom' import Message from '../components/Message' import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps' function PlaceOrderScreen() { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) return (

Shipping

Address: {cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.city}, {' '} {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode}, {' '} Number: {cart.shippingAddress.number}

Payment Method

Method: {cart.paymentMethod}

Order Items

{cart.cartItems.length === 0 ? Your Cart is empty : ( {cart.cartItems.map((item, index) => ( {item.name} ))} )}
) } export default PlaceOrderScreen
